description:
The Mathis Longleeve is designed to deliver the performance required out on the trails while maintaining the styling expected of your favorite Longsleeve graphic tshirt.
The Mathis is constructed from a lightweight DriRelease® jersey knit. DriRelease® promises to help regulate skin temperature with it’s moisture wicking yarn construction. The fabric is also fast drying, typically 4x faster than a typical cotton tee. The style is designed with a classic fit and features our interior neckline climbing cord hanger loop and premium Run Amok branding including an interior heat transfer to eliminate any discomfort.
Because of the high quaity of our DriRelease® jersey knit the shirt is supremely comfortable with it’s soft & natural feel, is easy to care for and will keep it’s shape.
name: Roark Mathis Tie Dye LS Knit - Mens
